wikipedia_page.main: Manon Bonner Antoniazzi  (née Jenkins, previously Williams; born 15 April 1965), is a Welsh senior civil servant. Since April 2017 she has occupied the position of Chief Executive and Clerk of the Senedd. Previously she held the position of Chief Executive Officer of Visit Wales within the Welsh Government.

response: She is the younger sister of Manon Antoniazzi, who served as the assistant private secretary for the Prince of Wales and is now Chief Executive and Clerk of the Senedd.
*April – Manon Antoniazzi, née Jenkins, Chief Executive and Clerk of the Senedd
*Manon Antoniazzi, Chief Executive and Clerk of the Senedd
In 1991, Williams married Manon Jenkins, now Manon Antoniazzi. The marriage ended in divorce.
